name: pastefy
description: Pastefy is a lightweight and modern pastebin platform with authentication, versioning, and syntax highlighting. It is designed for private or public sharing with a responsive UI.

features.title: User Authentication
features.description: Optional account system allows users to manage pastes, track history, and control access to content

features.title: Public And Private
features.description: Choose visibility settings for each paste to share publicly, keep unlisted, or restrict to authenticated

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Organize pastes into folders for better management and categorization of related content

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Mobile-optimized interface works seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and smartphone devices

features.title: REST API
features.description: RESTful API enables programmatic paste creation and retrieval for automation and tool integration
